dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: You know, I think a lot of people assume that major drug busts only happen in, like, Western countries or something.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You know, I think a lot of people assume that major drug busts only happen in, like, Western countries or something.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, but this one was actually in Astana—uh, the capital of Kazakhstan. They just took down a huge drug trafficking group.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, but this one was actually in Astana-uh, the capital of Kazakhstan. They just took down a huge drug trafficking group.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Police in Astana have dismantled a transnational drug trafficking group and seized more than 100 kilograms of mephedrone, according to the Ministry of Internal Affairs (MIA).

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and they seized over 100 kilograms of mephedrone. That's a synthetic drug, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and they seized over one hundred kilograms of mephedrone. That's a synthetic drug, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As part of the operation, officers from anti-narcotics units eliminated the activities of a transnational criminal group engaged in the illicit trafficking of synthetic drugs, Meirkhan said. Over 100 kilograms of mephedrone were confiscated from the foreign suspects.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's sometimes called "meow meow" or something like that on the street. And the authorities said it was worth around $6 million.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's sometimes called meow meow or something like that on the street. And the authorities said it was worth around six dollars million.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Authorities estimate the street value of the seized drugs at around $6 million, equivalent to approximately 300,000 individual doses.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Six million dollars? That's insane. And they said that's like 300,000 individual doses?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Six million dollars? That's insane. And they said that's like three hundred thousand individual doses?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Authorities estimate the street value of the seized drugs at around $6 million, equivalent to approximately 300,000 individual doses.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. It's crazy to think about the scale of this operation. They arrested foreign nationals too—the footage is out there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. It's crazy to think about the scale of this operation. They arrested foreign nationals too-the footage is out there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Footage of the dramatic arrest of foreign nationals suspected of involvement in the illegal drug trade was published by Polisia.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I saw that on Polisia.kz. Looked pretty intense. And it sounds like a coordinated effort with other countries as well.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I saw that on the website. Looked pretty intense. And it sounds like a coordinated effort with other countries as well.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, the National Security Committee (NSC), in cooperation with the competent authorities of Russia and Kyrgyzstan, conducted two special operations to dismantle international drug trafficking channels.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure, Daniyar Meirkhan from the MIA mentioned earlier cooperation with Russia and Kyrgyzstan to dismantle these international channels.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure, Daniyar Meirkhan from the M I A mentioned earlier cooperation with Russia and Kyrgyzstan to dismantle these international channels.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, the National Security Committee (NSC), in cooperation with the competent authorities of Russia and Kyrgyzstan, conducted two special operations to dismantle international drug trafficking channels.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So this isn't even their first rodeo, huh? They've done similar operations before.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So this isn't even their first rodeo, huh? They've done similar operations before.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, the National Security Committee (NSC), in cooperation with the competent authorities of Russia and Kyrgyzstan, conducted two special operations to dismantle international drug trafficking channels.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly. It seems like they're really cracking down on synthetic drugs crossing borders.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly. It seems like they're really cracking down on synthetic drugs crossing borders.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And all the people involved are in custody now, right? In a temporary detention facility.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And all the people involved are in custody now, right? In a temporary detention facility.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All suspects have been detained and placed in a temporary detention facility.

dialogue_turns.text: Yep, and the investigation is still ongoing. But man, seizing that much mephedrone is a huge win.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yep, and the investigation is still ongoing. But man, seizing that much mephedrone is a huge win.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Further investigative work is ongoing, Meirkhan added.

dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Makes you wonder how many similar groups are still out there, though.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Makes you wonder how many similar groups are still out there, though.

dialogue_turns.text: Oh, for sure. But at least this one's off the streets.
